title: Men's Winter Jacket
description: This is a brand new winter jacket for men, made of high-quality materials and designed to keep you warm in even the coldest temperatures. The jacket is waterproof and windproof, and features a removable hood, adjustable cuffs, and multiple pockets for storing your essentials. The stylish design and comfortable fit make this jacket perfect for any outdoor activity, from hiking and camping to skiing and snowboarding. Don't let the cold weather stop you from enjoying your favorite activities - grab this jacket today and stay warm all winter long!

title: Women's Running Shoes
description: These running shoes are perfect for women who want to stay active and comfortable on their feet. The shoes feature a breathable mesh upper, a cushioned insole, and a durable rubber outsole that provides excellent traction on any surface. The lightweight design and stylish look make these shoes perfect for running, walking, or just everyday wear. Whether you're hitting the gym or running errands, these shoes will keep you looking and feeling great. Don't miss out on this amazing deal - get your pair today!

title: Children's Toys
description: These toys are perfect for children of all ages, with a variety of options to choose from. Whether you're looking for educational toys that help with learning and development, or fun toys that encourage creativity and imagination, you'll find it all here. The toys are made of high-quality materials that are safe and durable, and are designed to provide hours of entertainment for your little ones. From action figures and dolls to puzzles and games, there's something for everyone. Give your children the gift of fun and learning - order these toys today!

title: Bicycle
description: A used bicycle in good condition, perfect for commuting or leisurely rides around town. Comes with a basket and a lock. Free to anyone who can come pick it up from central Warsaw.

title: Houseplants
description: I have several houseplants that I no longer have room for. These include a spider plant, a peace lily, and a philodendron. They are all healthy and would thrive in a sunny spot. Free to anyone who can pick them up in Krakow.

title: Baby clothes
description: I have a bag of baby clothes that my child has outgrown. They range in size from newborn to 6 months, and include onesies, sleepers, and pants. They are all clean and in good condition. Free to anyone who can pick them up from Poznan.

title: Board games
description: I have several board games that I no longer play and would like to give away. These include Settlers of Catan, Ticket to Ride, and Carcassonne. They are all complete and in good condition. Free to anyone who can come pick them up from Gdansk.

title: Furniture
description: I am moving and need to get rid of some furniture. This includes a couch, a coffee table, and two side tables. They are all in good condition, but I don't have room for them in my new place. Free to anyone who can come pick them up from Wroclaw.
